instructions: Spread inside of each pita pocket with guacamole. Place one piece of leaf lettuce into each pita. Fold meat in half and place over the lettuce. Top meat with two slices of cheese and sliced tomato. If desired, top with sprouts.
ingredients: 1 (9 ounce) package HORMEL® NATURAL CHOICE® Deli Turkey
4 slices Monterey Jack cheese, cut in half
title: California Turkey Sandwiches
